casebody.data:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2004-0320. Hoover v. Transcontinental Ins. Co.

Greene App. No. 2003CA46, 2004-Ohio-72. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Greene County. Upon consideration of appellant’s application for dismissal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application for dismissal be, and hereby is, granted.

ACCORDINGLY, IT IS FURTHER ORDERED by the court that oral argument scheduled for February 1, 2005 is cancelled and that this cause be, and hereby is, dismissed.
